item.description:
Thanks to the nice weather today I went for a walk and found that Jose Mac?s is currently closed for renovations?. Can?t say it didn?t need it! So for anyone who can make it I?m moving this meetup to Coogan?s which is diagonally across the street from Jose?s. Coogan's has a sign in the window for a free after work buffet from 5-7pm. Not sure what that entails but free is free!

I'll get there around 5pm and probably stay until 8ish.... hope to see you there!

http://www.irishconne...

Some folks declined the Jose's because they weren't a huge fan of the place. I'm open for suggestions for other meetups so please feel free to post a shout of your favorite place. I'll go anywhere(almost) as long as I'm NOT sitting there by myself... and thanks to Leo and Patrick it hasn't happened yet!

Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go - Thank You
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be on the bar side to the left as you walk in the door.
item.why: It's Thirsty Thursday.... do you need a better reason!
item.name: Coogans ** Change in Venue **
